text:
Sentiment indicators include opinion polls, the put/call ratio, the volatility index,
margin debt, and the short interest ratio. Margin debt, the Arms index, the mutual fund
cash position, new equity issuance, and secondary offerings are flow-of-funds indicators.
Technical analysts often interpret these indicators from a “contrarian” perspective,
becoming bearish when investor sentiment is too positive and bullish when investor
sentiment is too negative.
